EmailTemplate.name: APJ_Event_SG_Data Science Event_Q315.Day before reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: See you Tomorrow!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Friday, September 30, 2015 BASH 79 Ayer Rajah Crescent, Level 3 Singapore 139955 REMINDER - you are confirmed to attend Thank you for registering for the upcoming Pivotal Technology Workshop, Agile + Machine Learning: Applications and Analytics in the New Era <http://www.pivotal.io/event/applications-and-analytics-in-the-new-era>.
Questions? Please contact us via email <mailto:pivotal-operations@pivotal.io> or visit our website <http://pivotal.io>. AGENDA
2:00 PM - 2:15 PM Introduction
2:15 PM - 2:45 PM Examples of How Startups and Enterprises Have Benefitted from Machine Learning and Agile Development Capabilities using Cloud Native and Data Platforms
3:15 PM - 3:30 PM Break
3:30 PM - 4:00 PM Demonstration
4:30 PM - 4:45 PM Questions
4:45 PM Close VIEW FULL AGENDA <http://pivotal.io /event/applications-and-analytics-in-the-new-era>
